description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan

initial_choice - first choice between banana and pellet to assess participant preference/ choice_trial- participant preference trials/ trading_controls- to assess if participants would be willing to trade food items for their endowment/ identical_trial b(banana) or p (pellet) - participants were asked to trade one piece of food for an identical piece / endowment_trial - test: participants were endowed with banana or pellet and offered to exchange for the opposite type of food
type of food presented to the participants either in one of the two locations (choice) or to trade (trading-control trials)
location of the food indicated in the food column
whether there was a trade or not in the trading-control/ the identical or the endowment trials
whether the participant complete all trial steps
whether the participant gave the empty tube back after retrieving the food
